Posts.Content: Angel67 wrote: I have benefited greatly from the information, advice and support from this incredible website. I welcome anyone starting Chemotherepy in November to share your experience. I must admit I am a bit nervous to begin the chemo journey but am going forward with a great outlook and determination to make the best of it. I am having the port surgically implanted in a few days followed by a chemo class. I begin standard chemo 4 sessions of A/C followed by 4 sessions of Another drug. I pray everything goes smoothly. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo Nov. 2012 Angel67 michellej1980
